heading: Forging
welcomeHeading: Welcome to Qingdao Lolin Mech Inc.

sections.heading: Forging - General Information
paragraphs: We specialize in closed-die and open-die forging for high-performance components and our forging shops are equipped with state-of-the-art hammers, presses, and induction furnaces.
Production capacity reaches up to 3,000 tons per month.
Industries we are supplying: Construction machinery, Automotive parts, Railway vehicle manufacturing, Machine building.
Material specification producing right now: Mild carbon steel, Middle carbon steel, High carbon steel, Alloy steel, Stainless steel
Heat Treatment: Annealing, Normalizing, Quenching, Tempering, Carburizing, Induction hardening

Main Forging Equipments: 2 units 4000T hot die forging lines; 2 units 2500T hot die forging lines; 2 units 1600T friction press lines; 2 units 1000T friction press lines; 1 unit 630T friction press line; 3 units 400T friction press lines; 3 units 300T friction press lines; 2 units 160T friction press lines

Test & Lab Devices: 12 units of corresponding instrument including chemical analysis instrument, hardness tester, strength tester, metallographic microscope, magnetic power inspection machine, and etc.

sections.heading: Typical Products
paragraphs: We forge a variety of parts for trucks, railcars, farm equipments and so on.
